list.abs: 喜剧的仿作, 称为「大外套剧」(Comedia Palliata, 或称「长袍剧(fabula palliata)」, fabula 是「剧本」 之意, palliata 是指剧中人物穿著一种紫色的希腊长袍。.
fabula Atellana 阿特拉笑剧fabula palliata 披衫剧face 面
常服剧 (fabula togata) (罗马常服) 罗马题材新编, 义大利乡土人物凉鞋剧(fabula crepidata)(希腊日常鞋子)从希腊题材改编,上层人物或英雄官服剧 (fabula.

auth_sentence.content: On first listen Fabula might seem almost unremarkable but for its gentle appeal.
auth_sentence.res_content: On first listen Fabula might seem almost unremarkable but for its gentle appeal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On first listen Fabula might seem almost unremarkable but for its gentle appeal.

auth_sentence.content: Instead, hearing Fabula may induce a feeling of relaxation, a desire to sit back and dream.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead, hearing Fabula may induce a feeling of relaxation, a desire to sit back and dream.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead, hearing Fabula may induce a feeling of relaxation, a desire to sit back and dream.

auth_sentence.content: Fabula is endearing because it communicates an understated feeling of being at peace with itself without inducing somnambulence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fabula is endearing because it communicates an understated feeling of being at peace with itself without inducing somnambulence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fabula is endearing because it communicates an understated feeling of being at peace with itself without inducing somnambulence.
